home.title: Anderson Henrique
home.subtitle: Digital Intelligence Architect
home.description: Where logic meets poetry and machines become extensions of the human mind.
home.heroSubtitle: Exploring the nexus between technology and philosophy, where artificial intelligence meets human thought.
home.articlesSubtitle: Exploring themes at the intersection of technology, ethics, and digital society.
home.aboutContent: Developer and thinker at the intersection of technology and humanity. With degrees in Computer Science and Philosophy, I explore how artificial intelligence can amplify our cognitive capabilities while preserving our human essence.
home.ctaText: Interested in discussions about AI, OSINT, philosophy of technology, or collaborative projects? Get in touch so we can explore ideas together.

about.title: About
about.bio: Developer and thinker at the intersection of technology and humanity. With degrees in Computer Science (IFSULDEMINAS) and Philosophy (UFRJ), I explore how artificial intelligence can amplify our cognitive capabilities while preserving our human essence.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Let's talk about technology, philosophy, or anything interesting.

footer.tagline: Where logic meets poetry and machines become extensions of the human mind.
